ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="d1a47e48-45c8-45e2-a024-f5e4ea680744" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Monthly Inventory Balance" CreatedDT="2014-03-14T14:47:54.747" ModifiedDT="2014-05-29T14:34:01.773" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAAdTQ=" ReportVersion="0" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText: <QueryBundle> <QueryText>select * , EndingBalance = LastMonthBalance + Purchases - Usage , EndingCost = LastMonthCost + PurchaseCost - UsageCost , LastMonthCostTon = CASE WHEN LastMonthBalance=0 THEN 0 ELSE LastMonthCost/LastMonthBalance END , PurchaseCostTon = CASE WHEN Purchases=0 THEN 0 ELSE PurchaseCost/Purchases END , UsageCostTon = CASE WHEN Usage=0 THEN 0 ELSE UsageCost/Usage END , EndingCostTon = CASE WHEN (LastMonthBalance + Purchases - Usage)=0 THEN 0 ELSE (LastMonthCost + PurchaseCost - UsageCost) / (LastMonthBalance + Purchases - Usage) END , ReportMonth = DATENAME(MONTH, reportdate) --, ReportYear = DATEPART(YYYY, reportdate) , ReportYear = CONVERT(varchar(4), DATEPART(YYYY, reportdate)) from ( select InventoryItemName, convert(date, LastDayOfMonth) as ReportDate, LastMonthBalance = isnull((select sum(case when it.FromLocationGID = iil.LocationGID then -1 else 1 end * it.UnitQuantity / 32000) from inventorytransaction it left join Delivery d on d.DeliveryGID = it.TransactionSourceGID join inventoryitemlocation iil on iil.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and (iil.LocationGID = it.FromLocationGID or iil.LocationGID = it.ToLocationGID) and coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT) >= iil.trackingstartdt where iil.InventoryItemGID = x.InventoryItemGID and iil.LocationGID = x.LocationGID and coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT) <= dateadd(s, -1, dateadd(month, -1, dateadd(s, 1, LastDayOfMonth)))), 0), LastMonthCost = isnull((select sum(case when it.FromLocationGID = iil.LocationGID then -1 else 1 end * case when d.DeliveryGID is null then coalesce(ic.FifoCost, dbo.GetFIFOCost(it.UnitQuantity, iil.InventoryItemGID, iil.LocationGID, coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT))) else dbo.GetCost(it.UnitQuantity, it.DMPct, d.CostPer, d.ServiceCostPer, d.PriceMethod) end) from inventorytransaction it left join Delivery d on d.DeliveryGID = it.TransactionSourceGID join inventoryitemlocation iil on iil.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and (iil.LocationGID = it.FromLocationGID or iil.LocationGID = it.ToLocationGID) and coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT) >= iil.trackingstartdt left join InventoryCost ic on ic.SourceGID = it.InventoryTransactionGID where iil.InventoryItemGID = x.InventoryItemGID and iil.LocationGID = x.LocationGID and coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT) <= dateadd(s, -1, dateadd(month, -1, dateadd(s, 1, LastDayOfMonth)))), 0), Purchases = sum(case when Usage = 0 then NetQuantity else 0 end), Usage = abs(sum(case when Usage = 1 then NetQuantity else 0 end)), PurchaseCost = sum(case when Usage = 0 then Cost else 0 end), UsageCost = sum(case when Usage = 1 then Cost else 0 end) from ( select ii.InventoryItemName, ii.InventoryItemGID, iil.LocationGID, Usage = case when it.FromLocationGID = iil.LocationGID then 1 else 0 end, LastDayOfMonth = dateadd(s, -1, convert(datetime, convert(varchar, datepart(yyyy, coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT))) + '-' + convert(varchar, datepart(m, coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT)) + 1) + '-1')), case when it.FromLocationGID = iil.LocationGID then -1 else 1 end * it.UnitQuantity / 32000 as NetQuantity, Cost = case when d.DeliveryGID is null then coalesce(ic.FifoCost, dbo.GetFIFOCost(it.UnitQuantity, ii.InventoryItemGID, iil.LocationGID, coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT))) else dbo.GetCost(it.UnitQuantity, it.DMPct, d.CostPer, d.ServiceCostPer, d.PriceMethod) end from inventorytransaction it left join Delivery d on d.DeliveryGID = it.TransactionSourceGID join inventoryitemlocation iil on iil.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and (iil.LocationGID = it.FromLocationGID or iil.LocationGID = it.ToLocationGID) and coalesce(d.DeliveryDT, it.TransactionDT) >= iil.trackingstartdt join inventoryitem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID left join InventoryCost ic on ic.SourceGID = it.InventoryTransactionGID ) x group by InventoryItemName, InventoryItemGID, LocationGID, LastDayOfMonth ) z where 1 = 1</QueryText> <PreQueryText /> </QueryBundle>
